content: {"locationId": "6353", "organizationId": "5383", "name": "Bethel Agape Food Pantry", "address1": "1305 E Main St", "address2": "", "city": "Green Forest", "state": "AR", "zipCode": "72638", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "36.3323721", "longitude": "-93.4141413", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Carroll", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "We are located at the west end of the town of Green Forest.  We are in a metal building adjacent to Bethel Baptist Church.  We are USDA approved and accept all prospective clients because we have an offering of non-USDA foods.  We are a Christian organization, but adhere to the CIVIL RIGHTS. ", "notes": "We give a Thanksgiving/Christmas basket to our existing clients each year starting in November. Listen to the local radio station KTHS for announcements.
